channel.title: Canning on Something We Ate
channel.description: Recent content in Canning on Something We Ate

item.title: Peach Jam
item.description: So I’ve had a lot of fun discovering Jam (and by extension, preserving). It was largely inspired by a video series on tastemade. Kevin West taught the class on jam based entirely on his book Saving The Season. It’s a fantastic video series and the book is great. It’s particularly nice that he goes into explaining jam. I like to understand what I’m doing and really hate recipe books that just give you recipes without teaching you to understand what you’re doing.
